page.title: 11OUR FOOD
page.content: We eat all sorts of food like French, Italian and Chinese.Hamburgers and chips are junk food from a take-away shop. For breakfast I have cereal which consists of wheat,barley,oats,maize and rye.Then I have toast and marmalade. For lunch I have beans or chese on toast or maybe I would have sandwiches. I might have chocolate or cake. For dinner I might have meat with potatoes and vegetables,or I might have fish.For pudding I could have tinned fruit or a pie. People usually eat these things. At Christmas people have a tradition of turkey,roast potatoes and christmas pudding,plums and sweets. On your birthday you can have a cake, sausages on sticks,crisps and things like that.
